subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lukas Podolski scored both goals Sunday to give three-time champion Germany a 2-0 win over Poland in its opening game at the European Championship in Klagenfurt, Austria. Podolski was born in Poland but went to Germany in his childhood and became a German citizen. In Vienna, Luka Modric scored on a penalty kick in the fourth minute as Croatia beat Austria, 1-0.
